featured.text: People hoist their glasses 30 they are sitting around ski lodges, sailing, dancing, or enjoying a football game.

definition.zh_def: 航行，指在水面上駕駛船隻，通常使用風力推動。
definition.en_def: The act of traveling by boat using sails, typically powered by the wind.
definition.example: They spent the weekend sailing along the coast.
